import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete part supplier"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/{PartSupplierId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a part supplier by its unique identifier. Use this when a vendor is no longer active or should not be selectable for parts.

**Prerequisites**
1. **PartSupplierId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers) and extract `Items[].PartSupplierId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the supplier to remove.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers/\{PartSupplierId\}](/docs/api/parts/delete-part-supplier).
3. Confirm the supplier is gone via [GET /api/v1.0/parts/suppliers](/docs/api/parts/list-part-suppliers).

**Minimal Required Fields**: PartSupplierId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"PartSupplierId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the part supplier to delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Part supplier deleted successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response returned after successfully deleting a resource. >
  
</StatusCodes>
